QueryResult.text: (SELECT P.HIERARCHY_ID, P.ID PARENT_NODE_ID, P.OBJECT_CODE PARENT_OBJECT_CODE, P.INSTANCE_ID PARENT_INSTANCE_ID , C.ID CHILD_NODE_ID, C.OBJECT_CODE CHILD_OBJECT_CODE, C.INSTANCE_ID CHILD_INSTANCE_ID FROM ODF_HIERARCHY_NODES P, ODF_HIERARCHY_NODES C WHERE C.HIERARCHY_ID = P.HIERARCHY_ID AND C.SEQUENCE > P.SEQUENCE AND C.LVL > P.LVL AND C.SEQUENCE < P.NNB_SEQUENCE)
